object: Chilean victory | Bolivia becomes a landlocked country.

subject: War of the Pacific
object: Litoral Department (Antofagasta) ceded by Bolivia to Chile in 1904. | Tarapacá Department ceded by Peru to Chile in 1884. | Puna de Atacama ceded by Bolivia to Chile and Argentina in 1889 and 1899 | Tacna Region occupied by Chile in 1885, returned to Peru in 1925. | Arica Province and Tacna Province occupied by Chile in

subject: War of the Pacific
object: Map of the War of the Pacific.en2.svg | Map showing changes of territory caused by the War of the Pacific. Earlier maps (1879) show different lines of the border between Bolivia-Peru and Bolivia-Argentina.
